item.title: License Models Demystified: Per Core vs. Per Socket vs. Subscription
item.description: License Models Demystified: Per Core vs. Per Socket vs. Subscription In our virtualization journey after VMware, understanding licensing models is crucial. Different platforms (Windows Server Failover Clusters, Azure Local, and Azure VMware Solution) use varying licensing schemes – per core, per socket, or per subscription. These not only impact cost but also hide tricky expenses that IT decision-makers must catch. In this detailed guide, we’ll compare Windows Server 2025 failover clustering with Hyper-V, Azure Local (formerly Azure Stack HCI), and Azure VMware Solution (AVS) to demystify their licensing and uncover hidden costs.
